mapper.select: SELECT replyID, replyContent, replyGno, replyOno, replyNested, replyPostDate, memberID, commID, (SELECT memberName FROM Members WHERE memberID = r.memberID) AS memberName FROM Reply r WHERE commID = #{commID} ORDER BY replyGno ASC, replyOno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply (replyContent , replyGno , replyOno , replyNested ,replyPostDate , memberID , commID) VALUES (#{replyContent} , #{replyGno} , 0 , 0 , now() , #{memberID} , #{commID})
mapper.update: UPDATE Reply SET replyOno=replyOno+1 WHERE replyGno = #{replyGno} AND replyOno > #{replyOno} AND commID = #{commID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply (replyContent , replyGno , replyOno , replyNested ,replyPostDate , memberID , commID) VALUES (#{replyContent} , #{replyGno} , #{replyOno}+1 , #{replyNested}+1 , now() , #{memberID} , #{commID})
